column2: # Create a more detailed visualization of model performance
ggplot(token_model_results$results, aes(x = token, y = rmse, fill = model)) +
subtitle = "Lower RMSE indicates better prediction accuracy",
ggplot(token_model_results$results, aes(x = token, y = r_squared, fill = model)) +
subtitle = "Higher RÂ² indicates better fit (1.0 = perfect prediction)",
